attributes.action: To not reopen schools on the 8th March 2021 due to unsafe conditions
attributes.background: Due to the current situation of COVID-19, it is unsafe to reopen schools on the 8th March 2021. With the multiple new strains of the virus present in England, as well as the vaccination’s staggered administration, it is very unsafe to reopen schools at this current time.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Delay the return of school to the 22nd of march to keep students and staff safe
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575843

Keep schools closed until May
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573621
